reviews.review: Отличная игра, вошёл в 7 лет вышел 57… потерял девственность
Wasted 12,75Euros game is full of hackers
玩了5天了，现在死之前终于可以看到人了
OMG! So much fun yet I want to blow my brains out at the same time. Would recommend :)
Esta muy bueno si te compras el prime, si no te lo compras estan lo cheaters de mrd
too many cheaters on this game :)

сплошная трата времени, денег и нервов
но меня это врядли остановит
Личная жизнь? Не, не слышали. Рекомендую вам данную игру, но хочу предупредить, что количество читеров вас крайне удивит(
Good game, this game is making good team play, be more friendly and training reaction and aim.

Game is famous, you don't need to hear it from me. 

BUT i will say, Counter Strike is THE game that got me into PC gaming in general. 
i remember going to PC cafes and renting a steam account to play modded counterstrike and Gary's mod whenever i was 10 years old. That was the coolest thing in the world to me.. I loved every second of it.

Say what you want about the game, but its created careers & endless amounts of fun for millions of people.

Игра реально говно, игроки токсики или малолетние дебилы, разрабы новго ни чего не добавляют, скины вообще стоят дороже реальных вещей, какого черта?? Так же античит просто лучший, мне даже лень коментировать
第一人称射击游戏，真实的物理引擎，爱了

Its the best competitive FPS shooter but I can't recommend this game due to all the cheating that goes on from the pro to the casual scene. If the pro scene was legit nearly 90% of the players would be shit w/o their cheats.
i like it because its fun
love the game been playing it for six years
Good game recommend getting prime though...
muito bom para você se matar
对萌新的游戏体验极好，连我的的低血压都治好了，匹配的队友犹如rippre,森破坐火车过来问我的保持心态秘籍
很经典的fps游戏，平衡性很棒。入坑fps的第一款游戏，推荐入手优先，挂会少很多。
游戏很好玩 已经封了6个号了  有小万没了
CSGO is a great game once you learn how to play but since the game has been out for such a long time, it can be a pretty steep learning curve.
非常不错的FPS竞技游戏。从1.1版本到现在的CSGO，都是我很喜欢的游戏。但是无可厚非的负面也有。现在官匹都是遇到很多开G的，导致现在基本玩玩社区服，实在是没什么动力玩官匹了
jogo maravilhoso, mas pena que no free tem mt xiter!
Rips off valorant in just about every way and yet feels like it was made and released a decade ago.

Jogo muito ruim, me arrependo todos os dias de ter instalado essa m3rda no meu pc. Espero que ninguém tenha o mesmo desprazer que eu, fiquem longe dessa obra de Satanás. O jogo é infestado de hackers, chorões, fanáticos por anime, racistas, pessoas desprovidas de inteligência, fãs de k-pop, entre outros. É completamente inaceitável o fato de que em pleno 2022 ainda haja tanta gente jogando essa desgraça. Espero que minha análise ajude as pessoas que nunca jogaram esse jogo a fazerem a escolha certa, que é passar longe dessa m3rda. E a quem ainda joga, largue esse vício dos infernos e vá viver a vida, praticar um exercício, socializar, tocar um instrumento musical, namorar, ser feliz. Faça qualquer coisa, menos sentar na frente do computador para passar raiva jogando isso, PRESERVEM A SAÚDE MENTAL DE VOCÊS!!!
